sentences.en: Card to activate a more suitable regular business trip or travel.
sentences.cn: 激活卡更适宜经常出差或旅游的人士.

sentences.en: Cooking fumes may activate the alarm.
sentences.cn: 烹调时的油烟可能会触发警报器。

sentences.en: Cytochrome P 450 enzyme system shown to activate many carcinogens.
sentences.cn: 细胞色素P450酶系统可以激活多种癌基因.

sentences.en: I can't even activate the neutrino dampers with her re - routing the helm.
sentences.cn: 我甚至不能启动她改舵的微中子节气阀.

sentences.en: I have studied this device, but have been unable to activate it.
sentences.cn: 我研究过这个设备, 但是始终不能激活它.

sentences.en: I thought I'd activate the shield and save the day.
sentences.cn: 我想我可以激活防护层这样就可以拯救这个城市了.

sentences.en: It is precisely these ultrafine perceptions that activate the individual.
sentences.cn: 正是这些精细的感知使个体活化的.

sentences.en: It's working, It just needs to build up enough power for the shield to activate.
sentences.cn: 它开始工作了, 它只是需要更多的电来激活防护层.

sentences.en: RPTP α can activate Src family kinases by dephosphorylation and promote transformation.
sentences.cn: RPTPα通过脱磷酸激活Src家族激酶,促进转化.

sentences.en: Students also think self - correction could activate their ability and creativity.
sentences.cn: 研究表明,老师帮助学生 自我 纠错,不仅能降低学生错误的重犯率,还能激活学生的语言能力和创造性.

sentences.en: The antibody can either neutralize the virus or activate the C system, which lyses virus - infected cells.
sentences.cn: 抗体或能中和病毒,或能活化补体系统以溶解病毒感染细胞.

sentences.en: The yeast’s growth is activated by sugar and warmth.
sentences.cn: 糖分和温暖的环境会激发酵母菌的生长。

sentences.en: These push buttons can activate the elevator.
This Email Address will be used to activate your Account.
sentences.cn: 此邮件地址将用来启动你的帐户.

sentences.en: We can also activate the class and upgrade the qualities the class.
sentences.cn: 还可以活化课堂,提升课堂质量.

sentences.en: We're the only ones who can activate the shield.
sentences.cn: 我们是唯一可以激活防护层的人.

sentences.en: Your food ration disk will activate any of our conveniently located vending machines.
sentences.cn: 你的食物配给磁盘可以方便地激活售货机.

words.tran_cn: 积极的；活跃的；主动的；有效的；现役的
行为，行动；法令，法案；（戏剧，歌剧的）一幕，段；装腔作势
行动；活动；功能；战斗；情节
催化剂；[助剂] 活化剂；[助剂] 激活剂；触媒剂
主观能动性；活动积极性
积极分子；激进主义分子
使激活；使活动起来；有生气（activate的过去分词）
行动；扮演，充当；表现，举止；假装，演戏；起作用，见效
刺激；使活动；使活泼；使产生放射性

trans.tran_en: to make an electrical system or chemical process start working

trans.tran_cn: 使活动起来； 使开始作用
trans.tran_en: to make an electrical system or chemical process start working
